name: HR Chatbot: Business Logic Tests > Policy Retrieval via RAG > retrieves leave policy for employee question

messages.content: What is our leave policy for paternity leave? Keep your answer brief.

response.content: Our paternity leave policy provides eligible employees with [insert duration, e.g., 2 weeks] of paid leave following the birth or adoption of a child. Leave must be requested [insert notice period, e.g., 30 days] in advance and can be taken within [insert timeframe, e.g., the first year after birth]. For more details, please refer to the employee handbook or contact HR.
